example.eg: Will fixed his bike with some small tools.  The student fixed the mistakes in her homework.
example.egtrans: 威尔用一些小工具把单车修好了。那位学生改正了自己作业中的错误。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 修理, 修复, 改正, 纠正

example.eg: Let me fix this poster to the wall.
We fixed the price at nineteen dollars each.
example.egtrans: 我们把价格定在19元一个。

example.eg: She fixed the meal for the children.
example.egtrans: 她给孩子们准备了晚餐。

example.eg: Now fix your attention on the tallest player.
example.egtrans: 现在把你的注意力集中到那个最高的球员身上。

example.eg: The election was fixed, and the government candidate won easily.
example.egtrans: 这次选举存在人为操纵，政府的候选人轻松取胜。

example.eg: The optometrist told him to fix his eyes on the dot on the wall.
example.egtrans: 验光师让他盯着墙上的那个点看。

example.eg: We use this chemical to fix the colours in the T-shirt.
example.egtrans: 为了让T恤永久着色，我们使用了这种化学品。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使（颜色）固定, 使长久

example.eg: Liz and Mark have decided to get married, but they haven't yet fixed a date.
example.egtrans: 利兹和马克打算结婚，但还没有选定日期。

example.eg: The fix had not lasted long, and the car was back in the repair shop.
example.egtrans: 那辆车修好后没有坚持太长时间就又回到了维修店。

example.eg: The addict got his fix from cocaine.
example.egtrans: 瘾君子吸可卡因过了瘾。

example.eg: The mafia arranged the fix for the boxing match.
example.egtrans: 黑手党通过贿赂操纵了这场拳击赛。

example.eg: The gelatine fixes in one hour.
The photographer fixed the prints in the correct solution.
Let me fix my make-up and we can go.
example.egtrans: 等我补好妆，我们就可以出发了。

example.eg: He is going to fix you right when he finds out about this!
Yes, all the dogs have been fixed so they won't have any puppies.

dsense.name: fix on [sth]
dsense.guideword: US, informal (date, venue: choose) (选定时间、地点)

example.eg: Have you fixed on a church for the wedding?
We'll fix up the living room with new curtains and a new rug.  She fixed up her house in order to sell it.
example.egtrans: 我们将用新窗帘和地毯来翻新起居室。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 修理, 修补, 翻新

example.eg: Stop trying to fix me up; I'm happy being single.
example.egtrans: 不要再给我介绍对象了，我一个人很开心。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为某人找约会对象，给某人介绍对象, 给...牵红线

example.eg: The management team met to fix the price for selling their newest product line.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 确定价格, 商定价格, 定价

example.eg: There's no point in shopping around for a cheaper one. The shopkeepers all know each other round here and fix the price.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 垄断定价, 价格操纵

dsense.name: fix [sb] up with [sb], fix up [sb] and [sb]

example.eg: Joan is trying to fix me up with one of her single friends.
example.egtrans: 琼正试着撮合我和她的一个单身朋友。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 安排…和…约会，给…和…做媒, 把…和…撮合在一起

example.eg: People addicted to street drugs will do just about anything to get a fix.
I talked to several people to get a fix on what actually happened.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 让某人陷入困境, 让某人两难
临时方案, 权益之计
